          <title>
            <string language="fr">Pli de montagnes</string>
            <string language="en">Fold mountains</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Falten Sie Berge</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dobre montanhas</string>

          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette carte du monde montre les montagnes formées à partir du pliage de la croûte de terre.</string>
            <string language="en">This map of the world shows the mountains formed from folding of the Earth's crust.</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Karte der Welt zeigt die Berge, die von der
Falte der Kruste der Masse gebildet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este mapa do mundo mostra as montanhas dadas 
forma da dobradura da crosta de terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo programma del mondo mostra le montagne 
formate dalla piegatura della crosta terrestre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτός ο χάρτης του κόσμου εμφανίζει τα βουνά που 
διαμορφώνονται από το δίπλωμα της γήινης κρούστας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta correspondencia del mundo muestra las 
montañas formadas del plegamiento de la corteza de tierra.</string>
